net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.mapper
Class OrphanResourceBundlesMapper

java.lang.Object
  net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.factory.mapper.OrphanResourceBundlesMapper
public class OrphanResourceBundlesMapper
extends java.lang.Object

Instances of this class will find all the resources which don't belong to any defined bundle. Will return a mapping for each of them.

Author:
Jordi Hernández Sellés
